[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1629273538183{padding-top: 4% !important;padding-bottom: 4% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/banner-Wall-1.jpg?id=9980) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-desktop”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1629273541643{margin-top: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(216,216,216,0.66) !important;*background-color: rgb(216,216,216) !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Plastering and Rendering Services in London

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1629100959805{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/banner-Wall.jpg?id=9550) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-phone”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1629100977809{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 500px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner el_class=”page-container”][vc_column_inner el_class=”page-con” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1629100994409{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Plastering and Rendering Services in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[vc_column_text color=”#ffffff”]
  • Our services include interior and exterior painting and decorating and plastering and rendering to residential and commercial spaces
  • Services available as early as the next day
  • Professional painters and decorators with a minimum of 5 years experience with plastering and rendering
  • Fully Insured to keep you covered: Health & Safety, Insurance, and Warranty
  • We guarantee a superb and long-lasting finish to any painting and decorating job
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628073461174{margin-top: 80px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”100% 95%”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628077156353{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9554″ img_size=”348×518″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

The Good Painter are experts in plastering and rendering for houses and large-scale commercial spaces

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Our teams of experts complete your plastering and exterior or interior wall rendering service in London, ensuring you receive a long-lasting, durable and concrete service in whatever texture or look you require. From plastering interiors walls to ceilings and rendering exterior walls, our job is to complete high-quality results for years to come.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1567527837900{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1629101187001{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

Our Services

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1567527809223{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9557″ img_size=”500×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Quality Renders

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Our team can deliver a range of different renderings for your exterior such as brick, coloured, silicone and traditional rendering, ensuring you receive a smooth quality finish.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9558″ img_size=”500×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Exceptional Plastering

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Our painting and decorating company will carry out your plastering service in a quick and timely manner, providing an interior outcome which is long-lasting and flawless.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9559″ img_size=”500×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Patch repairs

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

If you are looking for a minor touch up, part house rendering or a full wall rendering service, our skilled painters and decorators will fulfil your requirements passionately.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9560″ img_size=”500×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Complete Durability

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

We only use high-quality and reliable tools and materials to complete your wall rendering service. You are guaranteed to receive an exceptional long-serving result for your London property.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1628073730596{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Require a reliable wall rendering company to complete your job?

GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1595422094299{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9262″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

What we offer:

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text font_weight=”400″]
  • Exterior rendering service
  • Exterior wall coating
  • Plastering
  • Dry lining
  • Traditional Lime Plastering & Conservation
  • Fibrous Plastering & Moulding
  • Full house re-rendering
  • Patch repairs to render
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” typography_style=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1628074096979{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1628074091477{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ text_align=”center”]

Why choose The Good Painter

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

London based experienced team of painters and decorators

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Flexibility all over

Our expert team in London works weekdays, weekends, and overnight shifts to make sure you get your job completed within your time requirements. We are flexible when it comes to painting and decorating, allowing minimal disturbances for your neighbours and business.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Superior service and fast turn around

We respond to enquiries immediately for your residential and commercial projects. Our painters and decorators ensure a speedy service which is of high-quality and reliable, we complete your job without the hassle!

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Fully insured and protected

Your home and business will always be safe under our hands as we obtain extended Health and Safety, Insurances and warranties. It is critical to feeling that your space is secure, and The Good Painter will leave you relaxed as we deliver a superb service.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Skilled and Friendly Team

Our expert painters and decorators are highly trained and equipped to complete a magnificent painting, decorating and wall plastering and rendering job. Our friendly service will leave you peace of mind as we are passionate and experienced in what we do.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Complete customer satisfaction

Our painting and decorating company prioritise our customer’s happiness and satisfaction. We guarantee an entirely content and positive outcome to your space and ensure communication is apparent throughout.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Quality details in its finest

We are experts in the field. You will receive a job which concentrates on detail, functionality and durability as we are equipped with the best materials and tools for your space. Let The Good Painter handle the work while you wait for a beautiful result.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Offering free consultation

Our in-house painting and decorating experts provide a free consultation to gain a better understanding and feel of the project. We provide this to create realistic standards, schedules and offer full extensive knowledge to fit the project.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Obtain the perfect image

Our painting and decorating company don’t stop at the beautiful transformation of your freshly painted home. We want to deliver the full result and service, so we leave your home spotless clean to portray the perfect space of your dreams.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1628076791087{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Receive a complete wall rendering service today! Looking to repair and perfect your exterior or interior walls?

GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1569584577928{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Our painters and decorators use superior products
and deliver excellent quality jobs across London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We guarantee a perfect result

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1569595856788{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1065″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1081″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1067″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1018″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1083″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1569584577928{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:20|pp:15″]

Our painters and decorators use superior products
and deliver excellent quality jobs across London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

We guarantee a perfect result

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1628076976039{background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers say about us and
painting and decorating jobs we have completed across London

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552923219689{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_row_inner]

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
